sentence.Network_en: In male company, perhaps he did overstep the bounds of propriety.
sentence.Network_cn: 在清一色男性的公司里，可能他的举止确实有失得体。

sentence.Network_en: His marriage and family life is a model of propriety.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的婚姻和家庭生活都是规规矩矩的。

sentence.Network_en: Nobody questioned the propriety of her being there alone.
sentence.Network_cn: 没人认为她只身出现在那里不得体。

...代儒学的主要任务之一就在于修正儒家的礼学体系。而“波士顿儒家的一个主要工作重点，即是在儒家之中呼唤礼（ritual propriety） …

if wives strictly keep the precept with respect to misconduct , then they will have happy and harmonious households , and that society will be a society which maintains propriety .如果人人都能持不邪淫戒，便不会发生这些问题，夫妻坚持不邪淫戒，则家庭是个和乐的家庭，是社会是个守礼的社会。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'peculiarity, essential quality'): from Old French propriete, from Latin proprietas (see property)

entry.def: Propriety is the quality of being socially or morally acceptable.

example.ex: Their sense of social propriety is eroded.
example.tran: 他们的社交礼仪意识淡薄。

auth_sentence.content: A committee to consider the propriety of impeaching Arlington.
auth_sentence.res_content: A committee to consider the propriety of impeaching Arlington.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A committee to consider the propriety of impeaching Arlington.

auth_sentence.content: Financial resource then gets dragged into propriety activities.
auth_sentence.res_content: Financial resource then gets dragged into propriety activities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Financial resource then gets dragged into propriety activities.

auth_sentence.content: The pleasantness of an employment does not always evince its propriety.
auth_sentence.res_content: The pleasantness of an employment does not always evince its propriety.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The pleasantness of an employment does not always evince its propriety.

stems_affixes.word_buile: naive天真的+ety状态→n.天真,纯朴,幼稚
subtle微妙的,狡猾的+ety状态→n.狡猾,微妙[的感情]

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =one's/own,表示"拥有"; 2. 引申为恰当的

stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+propri恰当的+ate……的→adj.适当的,恰当的,特有的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 所有的, 私人拥有的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proprietor[n.所有者]+y……的,……人等→adj.所有的, 私人拥有的 n.所有者, 所有权
proprietor[n.所有者]+y……的,……人等→adj.所有的, 私人拥有的 n.所有者, 所有权
propri适当的+ety表名词→n.礼节,适当
ex出+propri拥有+at表动词→不再拥有→没收

means.word_mean: 正当,妥当;合适,适当,适宜

sentences.en: We hesitated at the propriety of the method.
sentences.cn: 我们对这种办法是否适用拿不定主意。

sentences.en: The sensitive matter was handled with great propriety.
sentences.cn: 这件机密的事处理得极为适当。
